sentences.en: ‘Jerry?’ she called, trying to quell the panic inside her.
sentences.cn: “杰里？”她叫道，试图减轻内心的惊慌。
阿斯匹林将止住你的头疼.

sentences.en: Do you think this will quell KANG's anger and stop the killing?
sentences.cn: 你认为这能镇压姜的愤怒使他不再杀戮 吗 ?

sentences.en: Even ginger ale, ginger beer or ginger biscuits can quell queasy feelings.
sentences.cn: 甚至生姜麦芽酒 、 生姜啤酒或生姜饼干都能减轻呕吐不适的感觉.

sentences.en: Extra police were called in to quell the disturbances.
sentences.cn: 已调集了增援警力来平定骚乱。

sentences.en: He is unlikely to send in the army to quell nationalist aspirations.
sentences.cn: 他不可能派兵去扼杀民族主义理想。

sentences.en: His actions have done little to quell the speculation.
sentences.cn: 他的行动无助平息传言.

sentences.en: She tried to quell the commotion in her heart.
sentences.cn: 她尽力平复心中的骚动.

sentences.en: Soldiers were sent in to quell the riots.
sentences.cn: 士兵们被派去平息骚乱.

sentences.en: The armed force had to be called out to quell violence.
sentences.cn: 不得不出动军队来镇压暴力行动.

sentences.en: The Information Minister is trying to quell fears of a looming oil crisis.
sentences.cn: 新闻部长正努力消除民众对一触即发的石油危机的恐惧。

sentences.en: The police had been called in to quell a minor disturbance.
sentences.cn: 警察奉命出动以平息一场小规模的骚乱.

sentences.en: The soldiers were ordered out to quell the riot.
sentences.cn: 士兵们奉命前去平息暴乱.

sentences.en: To quell inflammation, eat antioxidant - rich foods as berries, oranges, and asparagus.
sentences.cn: 为了平息炎症, 吃富含抗氧化剂的食品,如草莓, 橙子, 和芦笋.

sentences.en: Troops were called in to quell the violence.
sentences.cn: 部队被调来平息暴力事件.

sentences.en: What passion cannot music raise and quell?
sentences.cn: “有哪种情感是音乐所鼓舞不起与镇静不了的 呢 ?”

trans.tran_en: to end a situation in which people are behaving violently or protesting, especially by using force

trans.tran_cn: 压制，镇压，减轻，消除，使镇定
trans.tran_en: to end a situation in which people are behaving violently or protesting, especially by using force
